text: Hi everyone, I’m putting together a small package for working with pedigree files and was wondering if anyone had any thoughts on useful features. So far I just have the ability to read and write pedigree files assuming the FamID, Proband, Father, Mother, and Gender columns are all present (I know this isn’t necessarily the case, but it’s true of every ped I’ve worked with). I am planning to optionally support the Phenotype column and add support for trio based pedigrees.

elements.text: Hi everyone, I’m putting together a small package for working with pedigree files and was wondering if anyone had any thoughts on useful features. So far I just have the ability to read and write pedigree files assuming the FamID, Proband, Father, Mother, and Gender columns are all present (I know this isn’t necessarily the case, but it’s true of every ped I’ve worked with). I am planning to optionally support the Phenotype column and add support for trio based pedigrees.

text: How about sorting the pedigree so parents are listed before offspring, and removing offsprings whose parents aren’t in the pedigree?

elements.text: How about sorting the pedigree so parents are listed before offspring, and removing offsprings whose parents aren’t in the pedigree?

text: Sure, I can do that. Thanks for the suggestion.

elements.text: Sure, I can do that. Thanks for the suggestion.
